short_summary: Notice of proposed procurement. Department of National Defence seeks to acquire specific items with delivery details.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below with delivery to specific locations.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### International Application for Spare Parts

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Reference Number:** cb-525-68511941
**Amendment Number:** 5
**Solicitation Number:** W8486-249387/A

**Publication Date:** October 16, 2023
**Closing Date:** November 27, 2023, at 14:00:00

**Procurement Overview:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) has issued a tender for the procurement of spare parts as outlined in this Request for Proposal (RFP). The delivery of the spare parts is requested at Department of National Defence locations in Montreal, Quebec, and Edmonton, Alberta.

**Supply Category:**
The DND is seeking proposals for the following UNSPSC categories:

*   Marine craft systems and subassemblies
*   Master control systems
*   Cooling equipment and parts and accessories

**Tender Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

**Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Submission Requirements:**

*   Bids must be submitted by email to: DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca
*   Documents may be submitted in either English or French.
*   This procurement requirement uses electronic receipt of bids by email only.

**Contract Terms:**

*   The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
*   The delivery of the spare parts is requested by February 29, 2024.

**Tender Documents:**

The tender documents for this procurement can be accessed on the Canadabuys website:

*   English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22137/w8486-249387---spares-buy---rfp(en).pdf>
*   French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22137/w8486-249387---spares-buy---rfp(fr).pdf>

**Contact Information:**

Alexander Reynolds
alexander.reynolds@forces.gc.ca
(000) 000-0000

The Department of National Defence looks forward to reviewing your proposals for this tender.  Your proposal should include all relevant details and should be in accordance with the specifications outlined in the tender document. Your proposal must be submitted by the closing date to be considered.    Please see the tender document for further details. Thank you for
